text: Gilbert Edmund Kaplan (March 3, 1941 - January 1, 2016) was an American businessman, journalist and conductor. He was born in New York City, New York. He founded the magazine Institutional Investor in 1967. He was publisher of the magazine until 1990, and editor-in-chief for two more years, although he sold it in 1984. Kaplan died of cancer on January 1, 2016 at the age of 74.Sad news: Gilbert Kaplan has died ==References== ==Other websites== * Interview about 2nd Symphony * A musician of the New York Philharmonic Orchestra on Kaplan's conducting * "Desperately seeking Mahler", The Economist Category:1941 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from cancer Category:American conductors Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Journalists from New York City
title: Gilbert Kaplan
